scripts.fullinstall: npm run backendinstall && npm run frontendinstall
scripts.backendinstall: cd ../backend && py -m venv .venv && .\.venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: concurrently -t "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm" -n backend,typecheck,webpack -c bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgRed.bold "npm run backendstart" "npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npx webpack"
